attributes.action: Personal Care treatments for front line workers
attributes.additional_details:
I know lots of people in my industry who feel so helpless. We are used to helping people look & feel better about themselves. I personally deal with a lot of clients with depression & health problems. 
We train for years & never stop learning. Yet we’ve been made to feel like we are worthless. 
This would make us feel special while also giving something back to our hero’s.
attributes.background: To help out the personal care industry (Hair & Beauty) and to say thank you to our front line workers. I’d like to see vouchers given to all front line workers. These could even be 50% off a treatment if not free. It would work just like the eat out to help out.
